code: export default function validation(values){var error={};var email_pattern=/^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;var password_pattern=/^(?=.*\d)(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])[a-zA-Z0-9]{8,}$/;if(values.email===""){error.email="Name should not be empty";}else if(!email_pattern.test(values.email)){error.email="Email Didn't match";}else{error.email="";}if(values.password===""){error.password="Password should not be empty";}else if(!password_pattern.test(values.password)){error.password="Password Didn't match";}else{error.password="";}if(values.name===""){error.name="Name should not be empty";}return error;}
